7. Calls for strengthened cooperation between the UN and regional/subregional organizations, particularly in mediation initiatives.

8. Encourages African States to adhere to the African Union Non-Aggression and Common Defence Pact and subregional pacts.

9. Encourages African countries to work closely with the UN Secretariat and regional offices to secure peace, stability, and development.

10. Urges the international community to support African countries in achieving these objectives and welcomes G-8 Summit decisions to combat poverty in Africa.

11. Urges cooperation to develop African regional and subregional organizations' capacities to deploy civilian and military assets quickly.

12. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
